home.heading: Hi, my name is **Tristan**.
home.subheading: I'm a full-stack web developer, 3D generalist, gamer, and glorified _nerd_.

cards.title: 3D Modelling
cards.description: Hard surface, game assets, and stylised.

playground.heading: Playground.
playground.subheading: This page is my playground. Whenever I stumble across _attractive_ UI elements on the web or mobile apps, I attempt to recreate them. Not only does it serve to hone my skills, but it's always an enjoyable challenge.
playground.intro: I'm sharing this with you so that it may not only inspire you to try the same (if you're a developer) but also serve as a demonstration of my front-end development capabilities.
playground.tooling: My toolset of choice is [TailwindCSS](https://tailwindcss.com/), [React](https://react.dev/), [Next.js](https://nextjs.org/), [Vercel](https://vercel.com/), and [DatoCMS](https://www.datocms.com/)
playground.placeholder: I'm porting over all the UI experiments and examples from various places on the web I've used in the past. Please stay tuned; they'll be here soon.
